name: Kompany
description: '''Kyle Hagberg''' (born October 3, 1991), better known by his stage name '''Kompany''', is a Los Angeles-based [[dubstep]] producer and DJ. He is known for his releases on the British record label [[Never Say Die Records]], including his ''Revolt'', ''New Reign'', and ''Metropolis ''extended plays and his various collaborations with other Never Say Die artists.
